Package org.apache.fop.render.pdf

PDF Renderer

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
PDFConfigurationConstants Constants used for configuring PDF output.
PDFEventProducer Event producer interface for events generated by the PDF renderer.
PDFRendererContextConstants Defines a number of standard constants (keys) for use by the RendererContext class.
 

Class Summary
AbstractImageAdapter Abstract PDFImage implementation for the PDF renderer.
CTMHelper CTMHelper converts FOP transformation matrices to those suitable for use by the PDFRenderer.
ImageRawCCITTFaxAdapter PDFImage implementation for the PDF renderer which handles raw CCITT fax images.
ImageRawJPEGAdapter PDFImage implementation for the PDF renderer which handles raw JPEG images.
ImageRawPNGAdapter  
ImageRenderedAdapter PDFImage implementation for the PDF renderer which handles RenderedImages.
PDFBorderPainter PDF-specific implementation of the BorderPainter.
PDFContentGenerator Generator class encapsulating all object references and state necessary to generate a PDF content stream.
PDFDocumentHandler IFDocumentHandler implementation that produces PDF.
PDFDocumentHandlerMaker Intermediate format document handler factory for PDF output.
PDFDocumentNavigationHandler Implementation of the IFDocumentNavigationHandler interface for PDF output.
PDFEventProducer.Provider Provider class for the event producer.
PDFImageHandlerGraphics2D PDFImageHandler implementation which handles Graphics2D images.
PDFImageHandlerRawCCITTFax Image handler implementation which handles CCITT encoded images (CCITT fax group 3/4) for PDF output.
PDFImageHandlerRawJPEG Image handler implementation which handles raw JPEG images for PDF output.
PDFImageHandlerRawPNG Image handler implementation which handles CCITT encoded images (CCITT fax group 3/4) for PDF output.
PDFImageHandlerRenderedImage Image handler implementation which handles RenderedImage instances for PDF output.
PDFImageHandlerSVG Image Handler implementation which handles SVG images.
PDFPainter IFPainter implementation that produces PDF.
PDFRendererConfigurator PDF renderer configurator.
PDFRenderingContext Rendering context for PDF production.
PDFSVGHandler PDF XML handler for SVG (uses Apache Batik).
PDFSVGHandler.PDFInfo PDF information structure for drawing the XML document.
 

Package org.apache.fop.render.pdf Description

PDF Renderer
